New Records: The Oklahoma City Thunder set a franchise record with 15 consecutive wins
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points and the Thunder clamped down defensively in the second half to beat the NBA champion Boston Celtics 105-92
For the fourth straight game, the Thunder won after trailing by at least a dozen points
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed pride in the team's effort after the win
